attributes.description:
Honda accord 2.0 Exec AUTO in steel silver with black leather interior. Full service history and spare keys. Well maintained 1 owner car with full house of features. Only 168K and just been serviced so nothing to spend. Honda reliability combined wit sleek looks makes this the perfect family car with all the the luxury features you will need. Hurry to secure. Extended 2-year warranty available to purchase for all vehicles purchased from us.
We can arrange vehicle finance and assist with trade ins.   
Terms and Conditions apply.
Please call Paul on 0829527479  to view by appointment only.

PLEASE NOTE....All our vehicles are priced to sell and exclude on the road fees.

For your Peace of Mind and Ours - We are fully compliant with the Health and Safety measures relating to Covid 19 with all our vehicles fully disinfected after each viewing or test drive, Hand Sanitizer on arrival for all people entering and face masks worn by all. The social distancing rule of 2m is easily adhered to as we have a spacious lot, and it is outdoors too, so call us right away for a comfortable viewing by appointment only.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215604. Balance of warranty 5 year 100000km 
Balance of service plan 5 year 60 000 km
Beyond its luxuriously good looks, the refined HAVAL H6 boasts a powerful 2.0 GDIT engine with a series of advanced innovations such as a Miller cycle, electronic water pump, 12:1 high compression ratio, and a thermal efficiency of up to 38%. All of which reduces fuel consumption and emissions but still delivers remarkable performance. The mighty 2.0L engine delivers a power output of 150kW, between 6,000 - 6,300 r/min, and a peak torque of 320Nm, between 1,500 - 4,000 r/min. Enjoy reduced throttle response time by 200ms and improved gear-shift efficiency by 100ms with the innovative, second-generation 7DCT.
